Title: Episode #1.8
Writer: Joe Penhall (created by), John Douglas (based upon the book by), Mark Olshaker (based upon the book by), Erin Levy (teleplay by), Jennifer Haley (teleplay by), Erin Levy (story by)
Actors: Jonathan Groff, Marc Kudisch, Lindsey Shurmatz, Lindsey Hall
Plot: Bill and Wendy interview candidates for a fourth member of the team. Holden is intrigued by complaints about a school principal's odd habit.
